A

App - Class in Unnamed Package
The App class encapsulates the main functionality of the game.

Area - Class in Unnamed Package
The Area class represents the game area where the player moves and encounters creatures.

Constructor to initialize the Area object.
attack() - Method in class BattlePhase
Method for calculating damage during attack

Method for battle phase
BattlePhase - Class in Unnamed Package
The BattlePhase class contains the functionalities for in-game battles

Constructor for BattlePhase
body(ArrayList<String>, String) - Method in class Utils
Displays a menu or instruction body based on the mode and content provided.
border(int, String) - Method in class Utils
Prints a specified number of characters to create a border.

C

capture() - Method in class BattlePhase
Method for attempting to capture the enemy creature
Creature - Class in Unnamed Package
The Creature class represents the characters in the game, each with a name, elemental type, family, evolution level, and health.
Creature(Creature) - Constructor for class Creature
Copy constructor for creating a new creature based on an existing creature.
Creature(String, String, char, int) - Constructor for class Creature
Constructor for creating creatures with specific data.
Creature(Random, ArrayList<Creature>) - Constructor for class Creature
Constructor for creating enemy creatures.

D

display(String) - Method in class Area
Display the game area with the character's position.
Driver - Class in Unnamed Package
The Driver class represents the entry point of the program It contains the main method where the program execution begins.
Driver() - Constructor for class Driver
 

E

encounter() - Method in class Area
Check for encounters in the area and start a battle phase if conditions are met.

Inventory - Class in Unnamed Package
The Inventory class represents a collection of creatures that a player can carry.

The main method, where the program starts executing.
